prompt:
Here is the implementation code:

<implementation>
{{IMPLEMENTATION}}
</implementation>

Here are the tests:

<tests>
{{TESTS}} 
</tests>

Here is the description of the failing test and its output:

<failure_description>
{{FAILURE_DESCRIPTION}}
</failure_description>

Please carefully review the implementation code, focusing on the part that is relevant to the failing test described above.

In <bug_explanation> tags, identify the bug or issue in the implementation that is causing this test to fail. Explain the root cause of why this bug is resulting in the test failure.

Then, in <solution> tags, propose a specific change to the implementation code that would fix this bug and make the failing test pass.

Provide your full response with no further commentary outside the specified tags.

Language that I prefer the explanation to be in:
{{LANGUAGE}}

variables.hint_label: Provide files that contains the source code to be analyzed
variables.name: IMPLEMENTATION

variables.description: Description of the failing test and its output
variables.hint_label: Paste the test output here and give more information about the failing test
variables.name: FAILURE_DESCRIPTION
